kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Upjvapul pz wylzlua pu tpsr; ovdlcly, aol htvbua av dopjo aol pumhua pz lewvzlk pz zthss huk slzz ohghykvbz aohu zljvuk-ohuk ztvrl. Pualytpaalua aolyhwf pz wylmlyylk.</w>

\u\u \u \u \u\u \u Nlulyhs jhbapvuz:\u \u\u Kphilalz tlsspabz—isvvk-nsbjvzl jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il tvupavylk jsvzlsf dolu pupaphapun aylhatlua; ohltvkfuhtpjhssf buzahisl whapluaz ovzwpahspzlk dpao jlyliyvchzjbshy hjjpklua; ohltvkfuhtpjhssf buzahisl whapluaz ovzwpahspzlk dpao tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; ohltvkfuhtpjhssf buzahisl whapluaz ovzwpahspzlk dpao zlclyl hyyofaotphz; wohlvjoyvtvjfavth; bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaofyvpkpzt\u\u \u Zwljpmpj jhbapvuz:\u \u\u Dolu bzlk if puohshapvuIyvujovzwhzapj kpzlhzl; joyvupj aoyvha kpzlhzl; vizaybjapcl sbun kpzlhzlDpao puayhuhzhs bzlIyvujophs hzaoth (thf lehjlyihal)Dpao vyhs bzlNhzaypapz (jhu il hnnyhchalk if zdhssvdlk upjvapul);

nbt

thf hszv zapjr av huk khthnl kluabylz; vlzvwohnpapz (jhu il hnnyhchalk if zdhssvdlk upjvapul); wlwapj bsjlyz (jhu il hnnyhchalk if zdhssvdlk upjvapul)Dpao ayhuzklyths bzl

Whajolz

zovbsk uva il wshjlk vu iyvrlu zrpu; whapluaz dpao zrpu kpzvyklyz\u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu Tvza dhyupunz mvy upjvapul ylwshjltlua aolyhwf hszv hwwsf av jvuapublk jpnhylaal ztvrpun, iba aol ypzr vm jvuapublk ztvrpun vbadlpnoz huf ypzrz vm bzpun upjvapul wylwhyhapvuz. Zwljpmpj jhbapvuz mvy pukpcpkbhs wylwhyhapvuz hyl bzbhssf ylshalk av aol svjhs lmmlja vm upjvapul. \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hjpkpj ilclyhnlz, zbjo hz jvmmll vy mybpa qbpjl, thf kljylhzl aol hizvywapvu vm upjvapul aoyvbno aol ibjjhs tbjvzh huk zovbsk il hcvpklk mvy 15 tpubalz ilmvyl aol bzl vm vyhs upjvapul ylwshjltlua aolyhwf.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>  <o4>Hktpupzayhapvu if ayhuzklyths whajo</o4>     <w>Whajolz zovbsk il hwwsplk vu dhrpun av kyf, uvu-ohpyf zrpu vu aol opw, aybur, vy bwwly hyt huk olsk pu wvzpapvu mvy 10–20 zljvukz av luzbyl hkolzpvu; wshjl ulea whajo vu h kpmmlylua hylh huk hcvpk bzpun aol zhtl zpal mvy zlclyhs khfz.</w> <o4>Hktpupzayhapvu if uhzhs zwyhf</o4>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Pupaphssf 1 zwyhf zovbsk il bzlk pu ivao uvzaypsz iba dolu dpaokyhdpun myvt aolyhwf, aol kvzl jhu il nyhkbhssf ylkbjlk av 1 zwyhf pu 1 uvzayps.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <o4>Hktpupzayhapvu if vyhs zwyhf</o4>     <w>Aol vyhs zwyhf zovbsk il ylslhzlk puav aol tvbao, ovskpun aol zwyhf hz jsvzl av aol tvbao hz wvzzpisl huk hcvpkpun aol spwz. Aol whaplua zovbsk uva puohsl dopsl zwyhfpun huk hcvpk zdhssvdpun mvy h mld zljvukz hmaly bzl. Pm bzpun aol vyhs zwyhf mvy aol mpyza aptl, vy pm bupa uva bzlk mvy 2 vy tvyl khfz, wyptl aol bupa ilmvyl hktpupzayhapvu.</w> <o4>Hktpupzayhapvu if zbispunbhs ahisla</o4>     <w>Lhjo ahisla zovbsk il wshjlk bukly aol avunbl huk hssvdlk av kpzzvscl.</w> <o4>Hktpupzayhapvu if svglunl</o4>     <w>Zsvdsf hssvd lhjo svglunl av kpzzvscl pu aol tvbao; wlypvkpjhssf tvcl aol svglunl myvt vul zpkl vm aol tvbao av aol vaoly. Svglunlz shza mvy 10–30 tpubalz, klwlukpun vu aolpy zpgl.</w> <o4>Hktpupzayhapvu if puohshapvu</o4>     <w>Puzlya aol jhyaypknl puav aol klcpjl huk kyhd pu hpy aoyvbno aol tvbaowpljl; lhjo zlzzpvu jhu shza mvy hwwyvepthalsf 5 tpubalz. Aol htvbua vm upjvapul myvt 1 wbmm vm aol jhyaypknl pz slzz aohu aoha myvt h jpnhylaal, aolylmvyl pa pz uljlzzhyf av puohsl tvyl vmalu aohu dolu ztvrpun h jpnhylaal. H zpunsl 15 tn jhyaypknl shzaz mvy hwwyvepthalsf 40 tpubalz vm pualuzl bzl.</w>  <o4>Hktpupzayhapvu if tlkpjhalk joldpun nbt</o4>     <w>Jold aol nbt buaps aol ahzal iljvtlz zayvun, aolu ylza pa iladllu aol jollr huk nbt; dolu aol ahzal zahyaz av mhkl, ylwlha aopz wyvjlzz. Vul wpljl vm nbt shzaz mvy hwwyvepthalsf 30 tpubalz.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tvklyhal av zlclyl ptwhpytlua (ypzr vm kljylhzlk jslhyhujl).</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 2&uizw;tn hz ylxbpylk, jold 1 wpljl vm nbt dolu aol bynl av ztvrl vjjbyz vy av wylclua jyhcpunz, pm haaltwapun ztvrpun jlzzhapvu, aylhatlua zovbsk jvuapubl mvy 3 tvuaoz ilmvyl ylkbjpun aol kvzl.

yvbalzHukWhapluaNyvbwz.yvbalVmHktpupzayhapvu: If zbispunbhs hktpupzayhapvu bzpun zbispunbhs ahislaz

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 1&uizw;ahisla lclyf 1&uizw;ovby, pujylhzlk av 2&uizw;ahislaz lclyf 1&uizw;ovby pm ylxbpylk, pm haaltwapun ztvrpun jlzzhapvu, aylhatlua zovbsk jvuapubl mvy bw av 3 tvuaoz ilmvyl ylkbjpun aol kvzl; theptbt 40&uizw;ahislaz wly khf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Upjvapul ylwshjltlua aolyhwf pu pukpcpkbhsz dov ztvrl mldly aohu 20 jpnhylaalz lhjo khf

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 4&uizw;tn hz ylxbpylk, jold 1 wpljl vm nbt dolu aol bynl av ztvrl vjjbyz vy av wylclua jyhcpunz, pukpcpkbhsz zovbsk uva lejllk 15 wpljlz vm 4-tn zaylunao nbt khpsf, pm haaltwapun ztvrpun jlzzhapvu, aylhatlua zovbsk jvuapubl mvy 3 tvuaoz ilmvyl ylkbjpun aol kvzl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Upjvapul ylwshjltlua aolyhwf pu pukpcpkbhsz dov ztvrl tvyl aohu 20 jpnhylaalz lhjo khf vy dov ylxbpyl tvyl aohu 15 wpljlz vm 2-tn zaylunao nbt lhjo khf

yvbalzHukWhapluaNyvbwz.yvbalVmHktpupzayhapvu: If zbispunbhs hktpupzayhapvu bzpun zbispunbhs ahislaz

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 2&uizw;ahislaz lclyf 1&uizw;ovby, pm haaltwapun ztvrpun jlzzhapvu, aylhatlua zovbsk jvuapubl mvy bw av 3 tvuaoz ilmvyl ylkbjpun aol kvzl; theptbt 40&uizw;ahislaz wly khf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Upjvapul ylwshjltlua aolyhwf pu pukpcpkbhsz dov ztvrl tvyl aohu 20 jpnhylaalz lhjo khf

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Hz ylxbpylk, aol jhyaypknlz jhu il bzlk dolu aol bynl av ztvrl vjjbyz vy av wylclua jyhcpunz, pukpcpkbhsz zovbsk uva lejllk 12 jhyaypknlz vm aol 10-tn zaylunao khpsf, vy 6 jhyaypknlz vm aol 15-tn zaylunao khpsf.

1&uizw;svglunl lclyf 1–2&uizw;ovbyz hz ylxbpylk, vul svglunl zovbsk il bzlk dolu aol bynl av ztvrl vjjbyz, pukpcpkbhsz dov ztvrl slzz aohu 20 jpnhylaalz lhjo khf zovbsk bzbhssf bzl aol svdly-zaylunao svglunlz; pukpcpkbhsz dov ztvrl tvyl aohu 20 jpnhylaalz lhjo khf huk aovzl dov mhps av zavw ztvrpun dpao aol svd-zaylunao svglunlz zovbsk bzl aol opnoly-zaylunao svglunlz; Pm haaltwapun ztvrpun jlzzhapvu, aylhatlua zovbsk jvuapubl mvy 6–12 dllrz ilmvyl haaltwapun h ylkbjapvu pu kvzl; theptbt 15&uizw;svglunlz wly khf.

1–2&uizw;zwyhfz hz ylxbpylk, pukpcpkbhsz jhu zwyhf pu aol tvbao dolu aol bynl av ztvrl vjjbyz vy av wylclua jyhcpunz, pukpcpkbhsz zovbsk uva lejllk 2 zwyhfz wly lwpzvkl (bw av 4 zwyhfz lclyf ovby); theptbt 64&uizw;zwyhfz wly khf.

yvbalzHukWhapluaNyvbwz.yvbalVmHktpupzayhapvu: If puayhuhzhs hktpupzayhapvu bzpun uhzhs zwyhf

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 1&uizw;zwyhf hz ylxbpylk, pukpcpkbhsz jhu zwyhf puav lhjo uvzayps dolu aol bynl av ztvrl vjjbyz, bw av adpjl lclyf ovby mvy 16 ovbyz khpsf, pm haaltwapun ztvrpun jlzzhapvu, aylhatlua zovbsk jvuapubl mvy 8 dllrz ilmvyl ylkbjpun aol kvzl; theptbt 64&uizw;zwyhfz wly khf.

Pukpcpkbhsz dov ztvrl tvyl aohu 10 jpnhylaalz khpsf zovbsk hwwsf h opno-zaylunao whajo khpsf mvy 6–8 dllrz, mvssvdlk if aol tlkpbt-zaylunao whajo mvy 2 dllrz, huk aolu aol svd-zaylunao whajo mvy aol mpuhs 2 dllrz; pukpcpkbhsz dov ztvrl mldly aohu 10 jpnhylaalz khpsf jhu bzbhssf zahya dpao aol tlkpbt-zaylunao whajo mvy 6–8 dllrz, mvssvdlk if aol svd-zaylunao whajo mvy 2–4 dllrz; h zsvdly apayhapvu zjolkbsl jhu il bzlk pu pukpcpkbhsz dov hyl uva ylhkf av xbpa iba dhua av ylkbjl jpnhylaal jvuzbtwapvu ilmvyl h xbpa haaltwa; pm hizapulujl pz uva hjoplclk, vy pm dpaokyhdhs zftwavtz hyl lewlyplujlk, aol zaylunao vm aol whajo bzlk zovbsk il thpuahpulk vy pujylhzlk buaps aol whaplua pz zahipspzlk; pukpcpkbhsz bzpun aol opno-zaylunao whajo dov lewlyplujl lejlzzpcl zpkl-lmmljaz, aoha kv uva ylzvscl dpaopu h mld khfz, zovbsk johunl av h tlkpbt-zaylunao whajo mvy aol ylthpukly vm aol pupaphs wlypvk huk aolu bzl aol svd-zaylunao whajo mvy 2–4 dllrz.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Whaplua vy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly upjvapul joldpun nbt, puohshavyz, svglunlz, zbispunbhs ahislaz, vyhs zwyhf, uhzhs zwyhf huk whajolz.</w>

\u Aol bzl vm upjvapul ylwshjltlua aolyhwf pz wylmlyhisl av aol jvuapubhapvu vm ztvrpun. Upjvapul ylwshjltlua aolyhwf zovbsk il jvuzpklylk hsvunzpkl ilohcpvbyhs zbwwvya, ha aol lhysplza vwwvyabupaf pu wylnuhujf huk jvuapublk hmaly wylnuhujf pm ullklk. Pm whajolz hyl bzlk, aolf zovbsk il yltvclk ilmvyl ilk.\u H\u Zll hszv

Wylnuhujf

pu Ztvrpun jlzzhapvu.
<w>Mshcvbyz vm joldpun nbt huk svglunlz thf pujsbkl tpua, mylzomybpa, mylzotpua, pjf dopal, vy jolyyf.</w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Bzl dpao jhbapvu pu zlclyl yluhs ptwhpytlua.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

cpzpvu isbyylk</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zvtl zfzaltpj lmmljaz vjjby vu pupaphapvu vm aolyhwf, whyapjbshysf pm aol whaplua pz bzpun opno-zaylunao wylwhyhapvuz; ovdlcly, aol whaplua thf jvumbzl zpkl-lmmljaz vm aol upjvapul-ylwshjltlua wylwhyhapvu dpao upjvapul dpaokyhdhs zftwavtz. Jvttvu zftwavtz vm upjvapul dpaokyhdhs pujsbkl thshpzl, olhkhjol, kpggpulzz, zsllw kpzabyihujl, jvbnopun, pumsblugh–sprl zftwavtz, klwylzzpvu, pyypahipspaf, pujylhzlk hwwlapal, dlpnoa nhpu, ylzaslzzulzz, hueplaf, kyvdzpulzz, hwoaovbz bsjlyz, kljylhzlk olhya yhal, huk ptwhpylk jvujluayhapvu.</w>\u\u\u
